name: Arcana Force XII - The Hangman
text:
When this card is Summoned: Toss a coin and gain the appropriate effect. 
●Heads: Once per turn, during your End Phase: Target 1 face-up monster you control; destroy that target, and if you do, take damage equal to its ATK on the field. 
●Tails: Once per turn, during your End Phase: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK on the field.
